Class Record

java.lang.Object
Record
public class Record
extends java.lang.Object

Record

Process all input and output

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void banner()
    This banner displays the welcome statement of the program
    void clearScreen()
    This method is used to clear the screen
    void createRecord()
    Method used for the creation of new student record.
    void displayAll()
    This method is used to display all the information of all students being stored in the program.
    void displayInfo()
    This method displays all the users' name and student ID and searches a certain user information which displays their grades and the courses they are currently taking.
    void displayOptions()
    This method displays all the choices of the user
    void programLoop()
    Method programLoop is the main loop of the program
    void retExit()
    This method asks the user if they want to terminate the program after they run certain options.
    void updateInfo()
    This method also used an arrayList for changing the stored information of the user.

  • Method Details

    • programLoop

      public void programLoop()
      Method programLoop is the main loop of the program

    • banner

      public void banner()
      This banner displays the welcome statement of the program

    • clearScreen

      public void clearScreen()
      This method is used to clear the screen

    • displayOptions

      public void displayOptions()
      This method displays all the choices of the user

    • createRecord

      public void createRecord()
      Method used for the creation of new student record. Takes the student's personal information as well as courses for the semester and corresponding grades

    • displayInfo

      public void displayInfo()
      This method displays all the users' name and student ID and searches a certain user information which displays their grades and the courses they are currently taking.

    • updateInfo

      public void updateInfo()
      This method also used an arrayList for changing the stored information of the user. The user will be given two choices in changing their information; whether their personal information or add new semester to record. This method used switch cases since it has more than one choices.

    • displayAll

      public void displayAll()
      This method is used to display all the information of all students being stored in the program.

    • retExit

      public void retExit()
      This method asks the user if they want to terminate the program after they run certain options.
